metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: The History of Languages
A language is a structured system of communication.
content.html: A language is a structured system of communication.

content.text: The type of communication that involves the use of words.
content.html: The type of communication that involves the use of words.

content.text: What is a Language?
Apes and Whales communicate with each other.
content.html: Apes and Whales communicate with each other.

content.text: Birds and Bees communicate with each other.
content.html: Birds and Bees communicate with each other.

content.text: But only humans have developed a real Language.
content.html: But only humans have developed a real Language.

content.text: No other species can express ideas using sentences constructed by a set of words (with verbs and nouns).
content.html: No other species can express ideas using sentences constructed by a set of words (with verbs and nouns).

content.text: This skill is remarkable. And what is even more remarkable: Even children master this skill.
content.html: This skill is remarkable. And what is even more remarkable: Even children master this skill.

content.text: Spoken Languages
We are not sure of how old the spoken language is. The topic is difficult to study because of the lack of evidence.
content.html: We are not sure of how old the spoken language is. The topic is difficult to study because of the lack of evidence.

content.text: We don't know how it started. But we have a clue.
content.html: We don't know how it started. But we have a clue.

content.text: The great African apes, Pan and Gorilla, are our closest living relatives. Why are they called "Apes"? Because they ape. Apes mime to get their message across.
content.html: The great African apes, Pan and Gorilla, are our closest living relatives. Why are they called "Apes"? Because they ape. Apes mime to get their message across.

content.text: It is assumed that the evolution of languages must have been a long process. Our ancestors might have started speaking a million years ago, but with fewer words, more miming, and no grammar.
content.html: It is assumed that the evolution of languages must have been a long process. Our ancestors might have started speaking a million years ago, but with fewer words, more miming, and no grammar.

content.text: The Tower of Babel

content.text: Human Languages
Human languages contain a limited set of Words put together in Sentences :
content.html: Human languages contain a limited set of Words put together in Sentences:

content.code:
I'm going on holiday in my new car.

Vado in vacanza con la mia macchina nuova.

Me voy de vacaciones en mi auto nuevo.

Ich fahre mit meinem neuen Auto in den Urlaub.
content.code_html:
I'm going on holiday in my new car.
Vado in vacanza con la mia macchina nuova.
Me voy de vacaciones en mi auto nuevo.
Ich fahre mit meinem neuen Auto in den Urlaub.

content.text: Computer Languages
Computers are programmed with a limited set of Words put together in computer Statements :
content.html: Computers are programmed with a limited set of Words put together in computer Statements:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
var points = [40, 100, 1, 5, 25, 10];
points.sort(function(a, b){return a - b});

points.sort(function(a, b){return a - b});

content.text: Written Languages
Egyptian and Sumerian are the earliest known written languages.
content.html: Egyptian and Sumerian are the earliest known written languages.

content.text: (The oldest written language in use today, is Chinese)
content.html: (The oldest written language in use today, is Chinese)
